name: Toilet Paper
description:
Change the toilet paper in this exciting microgame!

My cousin Bekah gets frustrated when people DON'T CHANGE THE TOILET PAPER. However, CHANGING THE TOILET PAPER is a difficult and tricky situation. To help her empathize with the "other side", I've created this TOILET PAPER SIMULATOR to illustrate the challenges that others face when CHANGING THE TOILET PAPER.

View source code on GitHub:
https://github.com/rejcx/Pet-Peeves/

Built with Python and PyGame
